about_the_game:
Create a sophisticated backdrop for movies and stage plays with the Art Deco Theater tileset for RPG Maker!

The Art Deco Theater tileset includes:

Floor tiles:

Four plain floor tiles in cream, charcoal, teal and maroon
Four round rugs in above colors
Four colorful patterned rugs in square and round
Two tile floors in white and charcoal
Two colors of concrete floor – pale gray and medium gray
Grass and dirt tiles
Tables in maroon and teal
Lit path

Walls:

Plain walls in 4 colors
Tile walls in 4 colors
Various teal and maroon walls with gold and charcoal decor
Film-strip wall in cream, maroon and charcoal

Also included:

Stairs to match floor tiles
Chandeliers of several different sizes and placements
Curtains
Stage (with and without curtain)
Dressing room furniture and accessories – beauty supplies, dresser, wardrobe, shelves, vanity and more
Exterior art deco tiles with many different architecture pieces
Movie posters
Concession supplies – cordon, registers, drink machines, popcorn, hot dogs, pretzels and more
Numbered signs
Screens (can be made as wide/tall as you want)
Staircases


Events and Animations

Projector (with and without flickering light animation)
Treasure boxes in 4 colors
Various door styles in matching colors


UPDATE January 2025:

* Improved movie posters, included sample maps


Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
